## hpr3803 :: Chatbot hallucination

 A simple case of "garbage in, garbage out", but it's interesting to
see it "try" to make sense.
In this show, I asked ChatGPT to write me the script for an episode
of Hacker Public Radio, and tried to confuse it. Then, some thoughts on
chatGPT and these chatbots in general.
References:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ChatGPT#Limitations
https://spectrum.ieee.org/magnus-carlsen-chess-scandal-ai
https://help.openai.com/en/articles/6783457-chatgpt-general-faq
